name: solr
description:
Solr is highly reliable, scalable and fault tolerant, providing
distributed indexing, replication and load-balanced querying, automated
failover and recovery,centralized configuration and more. Solr powers
the search and navigation features of many of the world's largest
internet sites.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.
